title: [K-12] Experiential Teamwork and Conflict Management Workshop for Strengthening Entrepreneurial Team Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic entrepreneurship concepts and team project experience
context.additional_context: Team-based startup simulation in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can assign team roles and design collaboration processes in real-world startup scenarios.
Learners can apply 3+ strategies to derive constructive solutions in team conflict situations (cognitive/relational).
Learners can write peer feedback and propose team competency improvement plans using team performance evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
